statements: DELETE FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE bird_species = 'Swallow' AND population_trend = 'Decreasing';
DELETE FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE id = 1 AND bird_species = 'Swallow'
DELETE FROM BirdMigrationPatterns WHERE population_trend = 'Decreasing' AND migration_distance > 100
DELETE FROM PopulationTrends WHERE population_count > 100 AND bird_id = 2;
DELETE FROM PopulationTrends WHERE location = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM PopulationTrends WHERE year < 2010 AND population_count < 5000;
DELETE FROM PopulationTrends WHERE bird_id = 5 AND observation_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM MigrationRecords WHERE bird_id = 100 AND migration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM populations WHERE bird_id = 500 AND observation_date >= '2022-01-01';
